columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the network watcher

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a network watcher uniquely

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the network watcher

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the network watcher resource
